headline: Does Broadridge Still Offer Value After Shares Dip 7.6% and Revenue Forecast Upgrade?
summary: Trying to decide what to do with your Broadridge Financial Solutions stock? You are not alone. Investors across the board are taking a closer look at shares after some recent swings. Broadridge’s stock has shown just how dynamic even a steady industry name can be. There was a slight dip of 1.0% over the past week and a more noticeable slide of 7.6% over the last month.
